shared.feature-1-card:
Safe child transport

Responsibility to the next generation and nature.

There is space for up to three children age 7 or younger in the 100% recyclable EPP box produced with zero emissions. And their safety is top priority: the child seats all feature 5-point seat belts, while the side impact protection provides outstanding safety in urban traffic and the central railing doubles as a grab handle. Optional accessories, such as the all-season child cover or tarpaulin, are produced in a resource-efficient manner, and the child seats are made of 100% recycled material. So now you can transport your children worry-free. (Loading surface approved for up to 70 kg. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.)
shared.feature-2-card:
Flexible load transport

The right solution for any transport task.

The Packster 70 offers a 70-cm-long and 60-cm-wide loading surface and, with basic equipment, provides a cargo space of up to 240 litres. With the optional Cargo Carry System, the shock-absorbing and insulating EPP box can adapt to any transport project. Whether you need a level cargo surface, secure transport for standard Euro boxes or storage space for smaller objects – the Cargo Carry System protects your cargo thanks to versatile elements and diverse adjustment options. You can even transport up to approx. 375 litres, securely sealed, with the optional high box cover (loading surface approved for up to 70 kg).
shared.feature-3-card:
Safe handling

Simply and safely through everyday life.

Whether you are riding or parking, getting on and off or loading – the Packster 70 is incredibly simple to use at all times. Its small turning circle means that it is ideal for riding and manoeuvring in tight spaces. And its optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 with Magura disc brakes ensures that you retain control even if you have to brake suddenly: it reliably prevents tires from sliding, the rear wheel from lifting, and the whole bike from skidding out to the side. But even its standard Tektro disc brakes pack quite a punch if you have to stop quickly. The combination of high-performance headlight with daytime running light and well distributed reflectors guarantees that you can see and be seen.
shared.feature-4-card:
Adjustable seating position

Change riders with ease.

The height-adjustable saddle and stem let you adjust the seating position of the Packster 70 to different body heights from 1.50 m to 2.00 m in the blink of an eye, making it the perfect companion to family life and a flexible replacement for your car.
shared.feature-5-card:
Control Technology Package

Maximum riding enjoyment.

The optional Control Technology Package with the Riese & Müller Control Technology is synonymous with safety and dynamism: the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty riding experience and the best traction even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimised front wheel suspension and co-sprung luggage carrier form the core of the Control Technology. The result is powerful propulsion and sporty riding without any loss of energy.
shared.option-1-card:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00
shared.option-2-card:
DualBattery 1500
DualBattery Technology perfected by Riese & Müller ensures twice the range or far higher climbs, fewer charging breaks and longer-lasting riding pleasure. With the 1,500 Wh available, completely new destinations can be reached and you no longer have to worry about the range in your daily routine.
£1,212.00
shared.option-3-card:
Performance Package
The Performance Package consisting of performance brakes and lights as well as a suspension seatpost offers you even more riding pleasure. The Tektro TRP C 2.3 cargo brake can withstand extreme constant loads and provides great stability and reduced wear. The Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight offers the best lighting conditions, while the Supernova M99 Tail Light with brake light ensures maximum safety. The suspension seatpost absorbs vibrations and shocks and helps ensure a comfortable ride
£466.00
shared.option-4-card:
Control Technology Package
The Control Technology Package, consisting of a suspension rear stay, Performance brakes and light, provides maximum riding pleasure and ultimate comfort. Vibrations and hard knocks are simply ironed out, thanks to the perfectly coordinated full suspension of the rear swing arm. The Tektro TRP C 2.3 cargo brake can withstand constant loads and provides great stability and reduced wear. The Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight offers the best lighting conditions: the switch to high beam ensures a level of visibility otherwise only known with cars, especially in the forest and out of town, while the Supernova M99 Tail Light with brake light ensures maximum safety.
£932.00
shared.option-5-card:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0
The Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 with Magura ABS brake ensure that you remain safely in the saddle even when you need to brake suddenly – both on solid asphalt roads or gravel tracks. It prevents tires from slipping, the rear wheel lifting and the whole bike skidding out to the sid
£466.00
shared.option-6-card:
GX option
If you like riding your E-Bike off-road, then simply equip it with first-class all-terrain tires. The SnakeSkin side wall of the Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires guarantees exceptional grip especially when cornering. A 3 mm protective cover around the inner tube provides extra-secure puncture resistance.
£47.00
shared.option-7-card:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£0.00
shared.option-8-card:
Pannier rack
The minimalist pannier rack is ideal for fixing panniers weighing up to 5 kg each. The rear and brake lights are unobtrusively integrated into it. The “Form follows function” design principle has been exceptionally well executed with the pannier rack
£0.00
shared.option-9-card:
Carrier (for Control Technology Package)
If the front storage space is not enough, there is always the optional carrier. It is ideal for attaching panniers, making it perfect for longer bike trips too. The carrier can carry up to 15 kg of weight. Since it is secured directly to the frame, it also benefits from the suspension thanks to Control Technology.
£47.00
shared.option-10-card:
Additional chain lock with bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted..
£47.00
shared.spec-table:
Specifications

The Packster2 70 vario in detail

Frame colour chili matt*; urban grey matt*; white*
Suspension fork Suntour Mobie 34 CGO Boost, 20", 80mm
Rear shock X-Fusion Glyde*
Headset Acros Integration X, block lock; Cane Creek ViscoSet
Seatpost Satori Trident; Satori Elegance-LT OV 34,9 x 405mm*
Seatclamp JD, 40,0 mm, QR
Tires Schwalbe Big Ben Plus 55-406 Reflex; Schwalbe Super Moto-X 62-559 Reflex; Schwalbe 20" Smart Sam Plus 60-406 ECE-R75*; Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus 57-559 Reflex*
Tubes Schwalbe AV13; Schwalbe AV7
Rims Mach1 Trucky30 20" CNC; Mach1 Trucky30 26" CNC
Spokes Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black
Front hub Novatec Boost Cargo Disc 32H
Rear hub Enviolo 380, 36H
Battery Akku Bosch Powertube750 Vertical; Akku Bosch Powertube 750 Vertical*
Motor Bosch Cargo Line (smart system)
Display Bosch Intuvia 100; Bosch Kiox 300*
Crankset Riese & Müller, 170mm
Chain ring 55T, for Gates drive belt CDX
Chain guard Riemenschutzring; Belt guard*
Chain Gates drive belt CDX
Pinion 24T, for Gates drive belt CDX
Saddle Selle Royal New Lookin Male Eco; Selle Royal New Lookin Female Eco*
Pedals VP R&M Custom
Shifter Enviolo grip shift Twist Display Pure, continuous
Handlebar Satori Horizon, 31,8 mm, 9°, B=620 mm; Satori Noirette Plus, 31,8 mm, Alu*
Stem Satori, 60 mm, +/-17°
Grips Ergon ergonomic
Brakes Tektro Auriga Comp HD-500, disc brake; Magura MT C ABS*; Tektro TRP C 2.3 disc brake*
Front light Supernova mini 2; Supernova M99 Mini Pro-25*
Tail light Busch & Müller Toplight 2C LED; Supernova M99, integrated brake light*
Mudguards SKS A69R
Luggage rack Riese & Müller, MIK; Riese & Müller*
Rubber Bibia
Bell Billy
Kickstand Kickstand Riese & Müller
Lock ABUS Shield X+
RX Hardware RX Chip (für RX Services)*
Frame size [cm] universal*

The specification table indicates all available components for this model – not just the basic equipment. Some of the options listed are only available for a surcharge. For more information, see the Configurator. Riese & Müller reserves the right to make technical modifications as well as changes to the shape, colour and/or weight within reasonable limits.

* May differ depending on the availability in your country, design or configuration of the model.
shared.cargo-option-1-card:
Double child seat

£187.00

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position holds two children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. The headrest can be folded down into the box if required. Alternatively, you can transport larger loads by folding up the seat part of the double child seat. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.
shared.cargo-option-2-card:
Double child seat and luggage shelf at the front

£243.00

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position holds two children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. The front luggage rack offers maximum storage space. When folded down, it lets you transport luggage up to the size of a crate of water, and secure it, thanks to eyelets and other fastening options with additional straps. Alternatively, the luggage rack can also be used as a table for your children with space underneath for their feet. When folded up, it creates a luggage compartment, the rubber straps of which securely fix slimmer objects, like shoulder bags, in place. The 47-litre box supplied fits perfectly onto the luggage rack or into a shopping trolley and, thanks to its food-safe and recyclable PP design, is ideal for your weekly shopping. Alternatively, you can transport larger loads by folding up the seat part of the double child seat. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.
shared.cargo-option-3-card:
Three child seats

£271.00

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position along with a rear-facing single seat at the front allow you to carry up to three children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. Alternatively, the seat part of the third child seat can be folded back to create a separate luggage compartment. For even more storage space, the seat parts of the double child seat can be folded up to the rear and those of the third child seat to the front. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using..
shared.cargo-option-4-card:
Cargo Carry System

£187.00

With its versatile polypropylene elements, the Cargo Carry System enables loads of various sizes to be safely transported. Depending on your needs, you have the option of a flat cargo surface, storage space in the bottom of the EPP box, up to three load compartments and a securing element for standard Euro boxes with two side pockets for smaller objects. In the event of a higher load, the cargo can be secured with additional straps using four eyelets.
shared.weather-option-1-card:
Child cover

£280.00

The year-round cover provides protection from the wind, rain, snow and sun in any season. Its height can be adjusted depending on the position of the handlebar. The practical partial opening function and additional sun protection provide shade and pleasant cooling in summer.
shared.weather-option-2-card:
Tarpaulin

£75.00

We recommend strong, weatherproof tarpaulin to protect your cargo from dirt and rain. It will allow you to get your cargo to its destination clean and dry whatever the weather, while children can ride with the tarpaulin half or fully rolled back thanks to the flexible adjustment options.
shared.weather-option-3-card:
Flat box cover

£159.00

The flat, lockable box cover allows you to protect transported goods with a volume of up to 240 L against wind and weather. The folding polypropylene cover allows for easy loading and unloading.
shared.weather-option-4-card:
High box cover

£280.00

The high, lockable box cover made of EPP allows you to transport goods with the best protection and a maximum volume of about 375 L. And loading and unloading is still easy thanks to the low loading height.
shared.weather-option-5-card:
Lock for glove compartment

£28.00

The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.

shared.feature-1-card:
Built for families. Better for the planet.

The Packster2 70 simplifies everyday life — and it’s made from eco-friendly materials throughout.
shared.feature-2-card:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.
shared.feature-3-card:
Effortless to ride. Easy to live with.

The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.
shared.feature-4-card:
Equipped for the future.

Smart, safe, and sustainable.

The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.
shared.feature-5-card:
See clearly. Stay in control.

A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.
shared.feature-6-card: Safe handling
shared.feature-7-card: Adjustable seating position
shared.feature-8-card: Adjustable seating position
shared.feature-9-card: Control Technology Package
shared.feature-10-card: Control Technology Package
shared.option-1-card:
Additional Chain Lock with Vaude Bag – Extra security, neatly packed.
The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access. Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.
£47.00
shared.option-2-card:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 – Control when it counts.
Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
£466.00
shared.option-3-card:
Comfort Kit – Sit back and relax.
With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.
shared.option-4-card:
DualBattery 1500 – Go further. Climb higher.
With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.
£1212.00
shared.option-5-card:
Kiox 300 – Smart, sporty, connected.
Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.
£47.00
shared.option-6-card:
Offroad Kit – Grip that goes anywhere.
Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.
£47.00
shared.option-7-card:
Pannier Rack – Minimalist, functional, integrated.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.
shared.option-8-card:
Performance Kit – Built to push harder.
With powerful Tektro TRP C 2.3 brakes, premium Supernova lighting, and a suspension seatpost, the Performance Kit delivers serious control, comfort, and confidence. Brake harder, see further, and ride smoother — even under heavy loads.
£466.00
shared.option-9-card:
Carrier (for Control Technology Package)
If the front storage space is not enough, there is always the optional carrier. It is ideal for attaching panniers, making it perfect for longer bike trips too. The carrier can carry up to 15 kg of weight. Since it is secured directly to the frame, it also benefits from the suspension thanks to Control Technology.
£47.00

Additional chain lock with bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted..
£47.00

shared.cargo-option-1-card:
Box with Child Cover – All-weather protection.

£280.00

Shields children from wind, rain, snow, and sun. The height adjusts with the handlebar, and the partial opening and built-in sunshade offer airflow and comfort on warmer days.
shared.cargo-option-2-card:
Box with Flat Cover – Secure, weatherproof storage.

£159.00

This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.
shared.cargo-option-3-card:
Box with High Cover – Maximum space, full protection.

£280.00

Made from durable EPP, the high, lockable cover protects up to 375 L of cargo. The low loading height keeps access quick and easy.
shared.cargo-option-4-card:
Box with Tarpaulin – Weatherproof your load.

£75.00

The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.
shared.cargo-option-5-card:
Buggy – Safe, smart, and built for little passengers.

£327.00

The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain. Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.
shared.cargo-option-6-card:
Cargo Carry System – Adaptable by design.

£187.00

Modular polypropylene elements let you customise the space to suit your load. Configure up to three compartments, use the flat surface, or secure Euro boxes with built-in holders and side pockets. Four eyelets allow for extra straps when carrying taller cargo.
shared.cargo-option-7-card:
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Smart space for kids and cargo.

£243.00

Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo. Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley. Check local regulations before transporting children
shared.cargo-option-8-card:
Double Child Seat – Safe, flexible, and made for two.

£187.00

Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.
shared.cargo-option-9-card:
Glove Compartment Lock – Small items, safely stored.

£28.00

The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.
shared.cargo-option-10-card:
Three Child Seats – Room for the whole crew.

£271.00

Carry up to three children (age seven or younger) with secure five-point belts and recycled headrests. The third seat folds down for cargo space, or all seats can be folded to free up even more room. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.

Pannier Rack – Minimalist, functional, integrated.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.
shared.option-8-card:
Performance Kit – Built to push harder.
With powerful Tektro TRP C 2.3 brakes, premium Supernova lighting, and a suspension seatpost, the Performance Kit delivers serious control, comfort, and confidence. Brake harder, see further, and ride smoother — even under heavy loads.
£466.00
shared.option-9-card:
Carrier (for Control Technology Package)
If the front storage space is not enough, there is always the optional carrier. It is ideal for attaching panniers, making it perfect for longer bike trips too. The carrier can carry up to 15 kg of weight. Since it is secured directly to the frame, it also benefits from the suspension thanks to Control Technology.
£47.00
shared.option-10-card:
Additional chain lock with bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted..
£47.00
shared.option-11-card:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00
shared.option-12-card:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00

shared.cargo-option-1-card:
Box with Child Cover – All-weather protection.

£280.00

Shields children from wind, rain, snow, and sun. The height adjusts with the handlebar, and the partial opening and built-in sunshade offer airflow and comfort on warmer days.
shared.cargo-option-2-card:
Box with Flat Cover – Secure, weatherproof storage.

£159.00

This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.
shared.cargo-option-3-card:
Box with High Cover – Maximum space, full protection.

£280.00

Made from durable EPP, the high, lockable cover protects up to 375 L of cargo. The low loading height keeps access quick and easy.
shared.cargo-option-4-card:
Box with Tarpaulin – Weatherproof your load.

£75.00

The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.
shared.cargo-option-5-card:
Buggy – Safe, smart, and built for little passengers.

£327.00

The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain. Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.
shared.cargo-option-6-card:
Cargo Carry System – Adaptable by design.

£187.00

Modular polypropylene elements let you customise the space to suit your load. Configure up to three compartments, use the flat surface, or secure Euro boxes with built-in holders and side pockets. Four eyelets allow for extra straps when carrying taller cargo.
shared.cargo-option-7-card:
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Smart space for kids and cargo.

£243.00

Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo. Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley. Check local regulations before transporting children
shared.cargo-option-8-card:
Double Child Seat – Safe, flexible, and made for two.

£187.00

Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.
shared.cargo-option-9-card:
Glove Compartment Lock – Small items, safely stored.

£28.00

The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.
shared.cargo-option-10-card:
Three Child Seats – Room for the whole crew.

£271.00

Carry up to three children (age seven or younger) with secure five-point belts and recycled headrests. The third seat folds down for cargo space, or all seats can be folded to free up even more room. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.

shared.feature-1-card:
Built for families. Better for the planet.

The Packster2 70 simplifies everyday life — and it’s made from eco-friendly materials throughout.
shared.feature-2-card:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.
shared.feature-3-card:
Effortless to ride. Easy to live with.

The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.
shared.feature-4-card:
Equipped for the future.

Smart, safe, and sustainable.

The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.
shared.feature-5-card:
See clearly. Stay in control.

A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.
shared.option-1-card:
Additional Chain Lock with Vaude Bag – Extra security, neatly packed.
The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access. Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.
£47.00
shared.option-2-card:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 – Control when it counts.
Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
£466.00
shared.option-3-card:
Comfort Kit – Sit back and relax.
With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.
shared.option-4-card:
DualBattery 1500 – Go further. Climb higher.
With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.
£1212.00
shared.option-5-card:
Kiox 300 – Smart, sporty, connected.
Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.
£47.00
shared.option-6-card:
Offroad Kit – Grip that goes anywhere.
Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.
£47.00
shared.option-7-card:
Pannier Rack – Minimalist, functional, integrated.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.

£466.00

The carrier can carry up to 15 kg of weight. Since it is secured directly to the frame, it also benefits from the suspension thanks to Control Technology.
£47.00

The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted..
